```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

# folder
```{r}
folder <- "data/country-development-finance/csv/"
```

```{r}
csv_files <- list.files(path = folder,
                        pattern = "\\.csv$",
                        full.names = TRUE,
                        recursive = TRUE)

csv_files |>
  head(5)
```

# combine all the csvs
```{r}
combined_data <- csv_files |>
  lapply(function(file) {
    message("reading ", basename(file))
    read_csv(file, show_col_types = FALSE)
  }) |>
  bind_rows()
```


# save combined csv
```{r}
output_path <- file.path(output_folder, csv_name)
write_csv(file, folder)
```
